tasks.label: WPILib: Build Robot Code
args: YEAR=$(grep 'edu.wpi.first.GradleRIO' build.gradle | sed -E 's/.*version "([0-9]+).*/\1/'); JDK_PATH=$(eval echo "~/wpilib/$YEAR/jdk"); echo "Using JDK: $JDK_PATH"; ./gradlew build -Dorg.gradle.java.home="$JDK_PATH"

tasks.label: WPILib: Deploy Robot Code
args: YEAR=$(grep 'edu.wpi.first.GradleRIO' build.gradle | sed -E 's/.*version "([0-9]+).*/\1/'); JDK_PATH=$(eval echo "~/wpilib/$YEAR/jdk"); echo "Using JDK: $JDK_PATH"; ./gradlew deploy -Dorg.gradle.java.home="$JDK_PATH"

tasks.label: WPILib: Simulate Robot Code
args: YEAR=$(grep 'edu.wpi.first.GradleRIO' build.gradle | sed -E 's/.*version "([0-9]+).*/\1/'); JDK_PATH=$(eval echo "~/wpilib/$YEAR/jdk"); echo "Using JDK: $JDK_PATH"; ./gradlew simulateJavaRelease -Dorg.gradle.java.home="$JDK_PATH"

tasks.label: wPILib: Build and Simulate Robot Code
args: YEAR=$(grep 'edu.wpi.first.GradleRIO' build.gradle | sed -E 's/.*version "([0-9]+).*/\1/'); JDK_PATH=$(eval echo "~/wpilib/$YEAR/jdk"); echo "Using JDK: $JDK_PATH"; ./gradlew build -Dorg.gradle.java.home="$JDK_PATH" && ./gradlew simulateJavaRelease -Dorg.gradle.java.home="$JDK_PATH"
